name: Hero's Draw
description: Hero's Draw is a PVE card game where Inscryption meets Gwent. The setting is a medieval world (knights and magic). The game will have a story, which is composed of some characters with different decks, leading up to a boss fight. Currently, the game only consists of tutorials but will expand to have an overworld full of different levels and a deck builder for users to customize their deck. We appreciate any and all feedback!
